statements: SELECT * FROM SuccessStories;
SELECT author_name, story_text, success_date FROM SuccessStories;
SELECT * FROM SuccessStories ORDER BY success_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, story_text FROM SuccessStories WHERE success_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) as total_stories FROM SuccessStories GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT * FROM SuccessStories WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT author_name, success_date FROM SuccessStories WHERE success_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT story_id, author_name, success_date FROM SuccessStories WHERE author_name LIKE 'M%';
SELECT * FROM SuccessStories WHERE success_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_stories FROM SuccessStories;
SELECT * FROM success_stories;
SELECT author_name, story_text FROM success_stories WHERE success_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM testimonials WHERE designation = 'CEO';
SELECT testimonial_text, author_name FROM testimonials ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT author_name, success_date FROM success_stories WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM success_stories ORDER BY success_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT author_name, story_text FROM success_stories WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%' OR author_name LIKE '%Doe';
SELECT * FROM testimonials WHERE designation = 'Manager' AND testimonial_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT author_name, story_text, success_date FROM success_stories UNION ALL SELECT author_name, testimonial_text, NULL AS success_date FROM testimonials;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM success_stories;
SELECT * FROM success_stories;
SELECT woman_name, success_description FROM success_stories WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT woman_name, testimonial_text FROM testimonials ORDER BY woman_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM empowerment_goals WHERE target_completion_date <= '2023-06-30';
SELECT woman_name, goal_description, target_completion_date FROM empowerment_goals ORDER BY target_completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM success_stories WHERE achievement_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT woman_name, success_description FROM success_stories WHERE woman_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC
SELECT woman_name, COUNT(*) AS total_testimonials FROM testimonials GROUP BY woman_name HAVING total_testimonials > 1
SELECT woman_name, goal_description, target_completion_date FROM empowerment_goals WHERE target_completion_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY target_completion_date ASC
SELECT s.woman_name, s.success_description, t.testimonial_text FROM success_stories s JOIN testimonials t ON s.woman_name = t.woman_name
SELECT * FROM success_stories;
SELECT author, story_text FROM success_stories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT author, achievement_date FROM success_stories ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT author, story_text FROM success_stories WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT theme_name, theme_description FROM themes WHERE theme_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM success_stories ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, story_text FROM success_stories WHERE achievement_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, testimonial_text, testimonial_date FROM testimonials WHERE testimonial_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT tag_name, tag_description FROM tags WHERE LENGTH(tag_description) > 50;
SELECT theme_name, COUNT(*) AS theme_count FROM themes GROUP BY theme_name HAVING theme_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM success_stories;
SELECT name, story_text FROM success_stories ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT author_name, rating, date_posted FROM testimonials WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT s.name, t.tag_name FROM success_stories s JOIN story_tag_mapping m ON s.id = m.story_id JOIN tags t ON m.tag_id = t.id;
SELECT * FROM success_stories;
SELECT name, story_text, date_posted FROM success_stories WHERE date_posted >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT author_name, testimonial_text, rating FROM testimonials WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY author_name ASC;

SELECT ss.name, st.tag_name, ss.date_posted FROM success_stories ss JOIN story_tag_mapping stm ON ss.id = stm.story_id JOIN tags st ON stm.tag_id = st.id WHERE stm.tag_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY ss.name ASC, stm.tag_id DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(id) AS story_count FROM categories LEFT JOIN success_stories ON categories.id = success_stories.id GROUP BY category_name HAVING story_count > 0 ORDER BY story_count DESC;
